> [htgozn](#comment_8_1J58Rie679DVSuKB1iDyFFTbzmaMaY2bt2): It is necessary if you want Zeronet to have access to the TOR service which was important to my install. [...]

I don't buy this.. what is the reason it doesn't have access? Either restart a service or reload firewall if those are the reasons. Sometimes it's the environment , for which simply running bash is enough or logging out and back in. 
A reboot should never be the answer to a userspace app.
